title: Line deleting in FL
content:
When selecting a line and hitting delete, the line was deleted in FL 4.6.  
This doesn´t happen in 5.0.2.. why? How do I delete the line?

 [‹ TrueType OpenType arabic on Mac](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605054831/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27419 "Go to previous forum topic") [OpenType to TrueType? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605054831/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27467 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Toby

comments.content: What line are you talking about? Where?
Any line between two points when drawing in glyph window..

You can change that behaviour in the Preferences. Glyph Window, Advanced.

FL gives you all kinds of options. It’s frustrating getting to know them, but ultimately it’s better.
